text: Most of the things we decide are not what we know to be the best. We say yes, merely because we are driven into a corner and must say something.
author: Frank Crane

text: There is only one real sin and that is to persuade oneself that the second best is anything but second best.
author: Doris Lessing

text: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
author: George Halas

text: Since we live in this world, we have to do our best for this world.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

text: Enthusiasm is the best protection in any situation. Wholeheartedness is contagious. Give yourself, if you wish to get others.
author: David Seabury
